title: Kcet students
content:
When will college starts for kcet students in both rr and ec campus?
Any one know about the date

comments.body: R1 students could attend from Bootstrap Day 1 itself. For R2 and R3 you'll have to wait for the college to let you know. Maybe you can join as soon as you finish the process, or maybe they'll make all R2 and R3 join together
We're already in lmao (R1 entry btw)

I asked r2 and r3 students of kcet
But I forgot to type

Hey 
What is the college fee apart from the kea fee to be paid ??
